message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
That's a bit too high for me. I'm interested, but I can only offer $85 for it right now.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too steep for me. How about $95? I'm really interested in this product and I think this price is fair for both of us.
I'm getting a bit impatient, but I still want to make a deal with you. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting closer to your price, but $105 is still a little more than I can afford right now.  How about we settle at $98? I really think this is the best price we can both agree on.
